user_request: Empty the shopping cart on newegg.com. Add logitech g pro to the cart on newegg.com, then select checkout.
last_action: click on the search suggestion "logitech g pro" located at the upper left part of the screen.
reflect_result:
By clicking on the search suggestion "logitech g pro" located at the upper left part of the screen, you have initiated a more refined search for the "logitech g pro" on Newegg. This action helped in narrowing down the search results, which are now displayed, showing various Logitech G Pro products. The search results include options such as the "Logitech Pro Wireless Gaming Mouse."

This is a significant step towards completing the user request. Next, you can select the desired product and add it to your shopping cart, which will move you closer to checking out as per your request. Therefore, this action has made progress in the overall task by facilitating the product search required for adding it to the cart.
